programme.title: Spontaneous Human Combustion: Natural Phenomenon or Flaming Fiction?
programme.desc: Spontaneous human combustion: Human bodies suddenly bursting into flame without any apparent heat source. This television program examines whether spontaneous human combustion is physically possible or is it nothing more than an urban legend.

programme.title: Bigfoot: Living Creature or Legendary Lie?
programme.desc: Bigfoot. Sasquatch. Yeti. Yeren.Yowie. There are reports the world over of these terrifying creatures. This program shows a chilling eyewitness encounter plus scientific analysis of the creature’s footprints providing startling insights into this mystery.

programme.title: Haunted House: Demon Poltergeist
programme.desc: For those who think that Ghosts and Spirits aren't real, this is a Ghost Investigation that will change their minds forever. The team from Haunted Events UK are called in to a 400 year old, three story, Victorian house on old High Street in Sutton Town, England - allegedly the most haunted area of Britain. Abandoned by the previous occupier due to alarming Poltergeist activity, the team enters the house to find it a wreck, strewn with objects scattered by the entities dwelling within its walls. Quickly, the team's medium is in touch with the Poltergeist who makes its presence known as a chair slides across the floor before their eyes, not once, but several times and on command. Unnerved but determined, the team moves around the house only to be bombarded by flying objects, lifting tables and two members of the team are even pushed to the floor. A never before filmed series of events occur, making this one of the most terrifying ghost hunts you will ever see. Witness flying objects, noises, thermal heat sources and experience strange forces working to warn the team to leave the residence by pushing over an investigator and leaving behind an actual thermal apparition.

programme.title: Secret Societies and Sacred Stones: from Mecca to Megaliths
programme.desc: For millennia mankind has worshipped stones, from Mecca to Megaliths we have held them aloft as sacred objects and gifts from the gods. The worship of sacred stones constitutes the most ancient form of religion. From the origin of ritualized worship in Sumeria and Egypt to Secret Societies such as the Knights Templar and the Illuminati, ancient stones have been been idolized and used in secret and magical ceremonies unknown to the outside world. They have been placed at the very center of religious icons, used to take power over the souls of others and have been fashioned into beautiful gems and artifacts and yet, the stones remain a mystery. But why? What is the secret in the stones? In this unique film we uncover the secrets of the stones with a group of experts including Egyptologist, Ahmed Osman, Metallurgist, Robert Feather, UFO expert, Nick Pope, TV presenter on the esoteric, Franky Ma, filmmaker, Zachary Miller and New York Times best selling author of mysteries, Patrice Chaplin. This special team were brought together for the motion picture, The Stone, and this fascinating documentary reveals the story behind the film and it's meaning. Produced by mystery writer, Andrew Gough and Directed by Writer & Director of The Stone, Philip Gardiner, this special DVD features unseen footage from the movie, music and loads of special features. Prepare to enter a magical realm of secrets and mystery.

programme.title: Sinister Visions
programme.desc: SINISTER VISIONS is a collaboration of cutting edge filmmakers from the USA, UK, Sweden and Denmark and consists of five nerve shattering horror stories that will make your bones freeze.

programme.title: Rock The Park S04 E08 - San Juan National Forest NB
programme.desc: Colton and Jack are heading deep into the San Juan National Forest in Colorado to climb their first 14,000-foot mountain.

programme.title: Alan Cummings: Paradise Homes S01 E01 - Norfolk and Ontario NB
programme.desc: Alan takes to the water of the Norfolk Broads, where he meets a family who have created their paradise home in a beautifully serene setting by the water. There is more than meets the eye as he discovers the treacherous pike and quicksand close by, learning that practicality is also important in creating paradise! He then dives into the Canadian wilderness to visit an old cabin-converted magical woodland playground. But will he be able to avoid the grizzly bears on his own quest for paradise?

programme.title: Descending S01 E05 - The Dive God NB
programme.desc: While island-hopping in the Caribbean, Scott and Ellis meet the ‘Dive God’. But there is trouble in paradise as the team learns of a poisonous, invasive species that threatens these beautiful blue waters.

programme.title: The Island With Bear Grylls S01 E05 NB
programme.desc: Bear Grylls is abandoning 13 ordinary British men on a remote, uninhabited island in the pacific. Can they survive for a month completely alone? When stripped of all the luxuries and conveniences of 21st century living, does modern British man still have the spirit and skills to survive? The men are dropped off by Bear, and they are left totally alone with the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. In danger of being overwhelmed by the tides they battle through the dense undergrowth and the enormity of the task ahead quickly dawns on them.

programme.title: Art & The City S01 E01 - Chicago NB
programme.desc: "David Keeps explores Chicago’s rich artistic legacy, from historic skyscrapers and world class museums to edgy galleries and street-level creativity. Revealing how the city’s architecture, public art, and diverse neighborhoods shape its vibrant cultural identity ."

programme.title: Art & The City S01 E02 - Paris NB
programme.desc: David Keeps explores Paris’s artistic soul, from haute couture and macarons to Impressionist masterpieces, underground studios, and absinthe rituals uncovering timeless creativity in grand museums, hidden galleries, and the poetic pulse of the City of Light.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Rihanna vs. Chris Brown
programme.desc: S1:E1 Rihanna found herself the victim of assault, from her best friend and then-boyfriend, Chris Brown. Not only was she humiliated in front of the world, but she also faced further attacks from the media, some going as far as claiming the violence was her fault. We uncovered the real story of Rihanna’s experience during and after the incident, not the one portrayed by the media, where she shows us why she is the strong, compassionate, graceful woman the world fell in love within the first place.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: Bre Lasley: Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: Bre & Kayli Lasley called 911 four times as they fought for their lives against an ex-con who broke into their home, but the police never arrived. How did Bre survive this terrifying home invasion? And what happened to her younger sister, Kayli?

programme.title: Muggsy Bogues: A Giant On The Court
programme.desc: Muggsy Bogues is the shortest man in NBA history at only 5 ft 3. He’s also one of the best basketball players of all time. Coming from a rough neighbourhood where he was shot at by the age of 5, no one believed in him. He was bullied and mocked because of his height, yet today, he’s got some of the best basketball dunks ever seen. Now, everyone wonders: hows that possible? How did he even make it to the NBA? This is Muggsy’s story: a true underdog who had all the odds against him.

programme.title: Lopez Lomong: The Olympian Lost Boy
programme.desc: He went from running for his life to running to represent his country, seeing the worst human cruelties to life’s biggest blessings, and enduring years of hopelessness to experiencing the most fulfilling accomplishments. Lopez Lomong’s story proves what we can achieve if we make the most of the opportunities life gives us.

programme.title: Katelyn Ohashi: For The Perfect 10
programme.desc: Top USA gymnast Katelyn Ohashi was the best gymnast in the world, until she became the target of relentless body shaming from her coach and social media. The elite gymnastics industry is notorious for body shaming, and when coach Valorie Kondos took over at UCLA, Katelyn rebelled against the stereotypes and her revenge went viral.

programme.title: Rise Above Shame
programme.desc: Iyanla Vanzants husband mistreated her for years -- threatening their children and trapping her with fear of greater violence. She shares how she found the strength to leave and escape the cycle.

programme.title: Kevin Berthia: The Golden Gate Bridge Guardian Angel
programme.desc: Kevin Berthia tells the true story of how the power of listening and hope saved him from the darkest moment of his life on the Golden Gate Bridge.

programme.title: Michael Jordan: The Rise of an NBA Legend
programme.desc: Michael Jordan has lost almost 300 basketball games, but his most shocking loss is NOT what you think! His biggest loss came right after his worst nightmare came true, off the court. The secret truth behind the “Greatest Basketball Player Of All Time” finally came out when MJ’s suspicious loss led him down a “delusional” path. Why did Michael Jordan retire from basketball?

programme.title: Mia Kang: The Woman That I Am
programme.desc: Overweight as a child, Mia Kang suffered bullying and a far from ideal childhood. Desperate to lose weight and feel good about herself, Mia began starving herself at the young age of 13. She lost a lot of weight very quickly and this launched her into the modeling industry which continued to destroy her self-esteem and health, until a vacation in Thailand, and her discovery of Muay Thai changed her life forever.

programme.title: Ramla Ali: Blow by Blow - A Life in the Ring
programme.desc: After her brother died in the Somali Civil War, Ramla Ali and her family fled to the UK in hopes of a better life. But things werent easy for the young Somali... Ramla stood out and was bullied because she was overweight and from a different culture. When her mother bought her a gym membership in order to build her confidence, Ramla tried out a boxing class and fell in love with the sport. A move that would change her life forever.

programme.title: Linda Cliatt-Wayman: A Teacher Like No Other
programme.desc: Linda Cliatt-Wayman volunteered to be Principal of one of the most dangerous schools in America. On her first day, she quickly realized that the job was much more complex and frightening than she thought. But, she was determined to give her students hope, even when they were threatening her life.

programme.title: Chadwick Boseman: Live Your Purpose
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman lived a life of humility and service on and off screen. He didnt let his diagnosis stop him from showing up for those around him and using his platform to elevate black voices. A true hero, he made every day count.

programme.title: Blue or Red pill?
programme.desc: Mindvalley founder Vishen Lakhiani shares the secret to success and teaches a confused student how to make the right decisions in life. The choice is yours: Will you take the blue pill or the red pill?

programme.title: Find Your Way Back
programme.desc: Lisa Nichols delivers a powerful speech on how she struggled with abuse and depression and what these experiences taught her, and shares the best actionable advice on how to overcome even your most troubling times.

programme.title: Wolf of Wallstreet's Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Visionary entrepreneur Jordan "The Wolf of Wall Street" Belfort explains how his own tale of redemption can help motivate you at your darkest hour.

programme.title: Medicare Plan N Vs Plan G? Which Should YOU Choose?
programme.desc: Curious about your Medicare options? In todays video by Marvin Musick from Medicare School, youll uncover the key differences between Medicare Plan G and Plan N. Discover the benefits of both plans that allow you to choose from a wide range of healthcare providers, eliminating the hassle of pre-authorizations and providing lifelong coverage security. Plus, both plans come with a unique foreign travel emergency benefit, giving you peace of mind even when youre abroad! Marvin dives deep into the details of the coverage nuances. Plan G steps up with comprehensive coverage, addressing five out of six Medicare gaps, including deductibles, hospital co-pays after 60 days, skilled nursing facility co-pays, and more. It even covers excess charges added by specific doctors. On the other hand, Plan N offers four out of six Medicare gaps coverage, and while it comes with some small co-pays for doctor and emergency room visits, its slightly lower premium might catch your attention.

programme.title: The Pinnacle of Luxury: A Tour of the Best Cars Money Can Buy
"Car Depreciation, which cars hold their value"
programme.desc: "Lets break down what you need to know about depreciation, which cars are winners and losers, and how you can make smarter decisions with your money."

programme.title: Retirement Planning for Singles: Don't Make These Mistakes
programme.desc: Are you a single woman worried about your retirement? Youre not alone. Single women face unique challenges when it comes to planning and preparing for their retirement. We will explore some common mistakes people make when approaching retirement as a single individual and share a real client case study to help you understand how to address these challenges and create a retirement plan that suits your unique needs.

programme.title: The New Retirement Strategy That's Changing the Game
programme.desc: In the world of financial planning, theres one thing that often gets overlooked. Retirement is not just about investments and numbers; its about embracing lifes joys and purposes.

programme.title: How To WORK AND Receive Social Security At The SAME Time?!
programme.desc: Are you wondering how to make the most of your retirement income and your Social Security benefits? In todays video by Marvin Musick from Medicare School, youll gain invaluable knowledge into a topic that could shape your financial future. Marvin takes a Deep Dive into all of the ins and outs of working while receiving Social Security benefits, revealing the secrets behind calculating your monthly payout. Discover how your top 35 years of earnings, adjusted for inflation, influence your benefit amount and learn why your Full Retirement Age (FRA) is a pivotal factor in this equation. But, wait, theres more! Hell also walk you through the Earnings Test, an essential concept for anyone considering early retirement. Learn about the income thresholds and reduction rates that may affect your Social Security benefits, ensuring youre well-prepared to make these important decisions about your financial well-being and future!

programme.title: Why Are More Americans Feeling TRAPPED In Advantage Plans?
programme.desc: In todays episode Marvin Musick from Medicare School puts special focus on Medicare Advantage Plans. He compares the three main Medicare choices: Original Medicare (Parts A and B), Medigap (supplemental insurance), and Medicare Advantage Plans. He underscores the financial vulnerabilities of relying solely on Original Medicare and the advantages of considering either Medigap or Medicare Advantage Plans to counter these risks. Marvin also addresses the critical concerns surrounding Medicare Advantage Plans. He highlights how these plans, while initially appealing due to their low upfront costs and additional services like dental care, can later reveal hidden limitations and unexpected expenses. This is a episode you WONT want to miss!

programme.desc: Wes Nolan wakes up in an abandoned warehouse with a case of amnesia. He has been kidnapped by someone named "Lazarus" who has him held captive in order to get the cure for an Ebola outbreak. Wes was a virologist and microbiologist who was working to engineer a bacteria protein carrier to attack the Ebola virus before it could destroy human cells. Spotlight: New York City Mayor Eric Adams at Bitcoin 2025 conference in Las Vegas
programme.desc: New York City Mayor Eric Adams made a prominent appearance at the Bitcoin 2025 conference in Las Vegas, held from May 27 to May 29, 2025.

programme.title: Apex Fusion: Bridging the Blockchain Divide
programme.desc: Imagine a world where blockchains don’t speak different languages. Where Ethereum and Bitcoin don’t just coexist but they collaborate. In this episode we sit down with the visionary founders behind Apex Fusion, a bold layer1 project on a mission to unify the fractured blockchain universe. With a tri-chain architecture and a bridge that actually works, they are not just building tech - they are potentially laying down the infrastructure for the next evolution of web3.

programme.title: US Crypto Report Says THESE ALTCOINS ARE THE FUTURE! XRP LINK HBAR
programme.desc: Yesterday, the White House released the first full crypto policy report via the President's Working Group on Digital Asset Markets. It mentioned and referenced some of the top altcoins and crypto firms!!! We will be uncovering the alts mentioned, plus all the important details included in the policy report.

programme.title: BOMBSHELL TRUMP CRYPTO PLAN JUST DROPPED (IT'S NOT WHAT YOU THINK)
programme.desc: The White House released a preview of its crypto policy report, but it's not what you think. We will be going through what you need to know, plus big news and announcements for Bitcoin mining stocks, crypto treasury strategies, XRP ETFs, Ripple lawsuit, Ethereum, VeChain, and more

programme.title: Inside the AI Revolution: AGI, Decentralized Intelligence & the Machine Economy
programme.desc: Live from Proof of Talk Paris 2025, this special episode of The Edge of Show dives deep into the explosive convergence of AI, blockchain, and decentralized infrastructure. We sat down with three visionary companies shaping the future of artificial intelligence and machine economies. First we spoke with Humayun Sheikh, the CEO of Fetch.ai, he breaks down the launch of ASI One and explains how agent-based AI is reshaping everything from enterprise tools to decentralized infrastructure. Next we welcomed back Janet Adams, the COO of SingularityNet, she offers a bold vision for decentralized AGI and why she believes decentralized models will outperform big tech in the coming AI arms race. And lastly the co-founders of Peaq, Leonard Dorlöchter & Till Wendler, join us to discuss how machines are starting to own and operate assets and drive real-world revenue in smart cities around the world. This episode is packed with insight, strategy, and optimism about how AI and decentralization are shaping the next decade of global innovation.

programme.title: Cuddle Up
programme.desc: There’s a slight chill in the air and it’s time to cuddle up with cozy fabrics. Joanne Banko is first with a cozy, comfy baby blanket and her tried and true method for making satin binding. Then, make the perfect hooded cape with Emily Thompson; in fleece or terry it’s great to warm up in the evening or after the pool. Finally, it’s time to add the sleeves to the raincoat with Angela Wolf.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Patterns
programme.desc: Patterns are a design, motif or decoration, formed from regular repeated elements. They can also be naturally-occurring or a random arrangement of shapes, colors which have a regular or decorative effect. Patterns can be stripes, or lines, or alternating colors. The first project has a striped pattern of knots tied with plastic lacing. Next, make felt cookies with a polka dot pattern. Then add a chevron pattern to your art journal. Last, create a folding play mat with landscape patterns of a city scene around a lake.

programme.title: Meaningful Gifts and Talismans
programme.desc: Artist Catherine Bickford presents ideas for meaningful gifts, including the symbolism of color and design motifs. Catherine discusses the meaning and symbolism behind various design motifs and materials. She shows how to combine themes, materials, techniques and motifs to create a talisman necklace that has significance and well-wishes for the recipient. Fair trade beaded bangles are featured on Katie's Beading Lesson.

programme.title: Leather Workout
programme.desc: Give your leather designs a real workout. Jewelry designer Katie Hacker warms up by creating a choker necklace with beads and leather cord. Jewelry-maker Jill MacKay cuts leather shapes and adds stamps, paint and beads. Then, she cools down by adding metallic effects to leather motifs.

programme.title: Episode 12: Turn on the Tools
programme.desc: Energize your creativity by adding power. Cheryl Boglioli gets into the groove with a cool stenciling tool. May Flaum adds texture with sewing machine stitches. Cheryl Boglioli shares a painting tip. Joe Rotella lights up lettering with twinkling lights.

programme.title: Stamping
programme.desc: No matter how many stamps you have, you need more. Color-happy artist Mou Saha draws and cuts custom stamps. Julie Fei Fan Balzer makes cool wrapping paper from paper bags. Joe Rotella, tool expert, manufactures his own stamps from foam. In the tip, Mou Saha throws her stamping process into reverse to create new looks.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Wot A Night (1931)
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tom and Jerry, two ambitious cab drivers, wait outside a train station for fares. When two strange men in top hats disembark from their train, the hacks solicit them until they give in and ask for a ride to their castle. When the men stiff the fare, Tom and Jerry pursue them, only to be trapped inside the castle by a portcullis. They wander about the residence and encounter a fearsome-looking bat, a bathing, whistling skeleton, a veritable army of ghosts, and other assorted ghouls and goblins. After meeting a skeletal quartet in black-face, they find the two strange men again and discover they've been turned into skeletons as well, after which they escape the castle and run for their lives.

This film shows how the industry takes on some of entertainments most popular franchises and makes them xxx; from Batman, to the Addams Family, to the Brady Bunch and even animated features like American Dad, there is nothing in mainstream that cant be made fun of in porn. If you love porn, you will love this movie. If you are a virgin to the world of porn, consider this Porn 101.

programme.title: CHAPPAR PHAD KE!
programme.desc: Customers are complaining about the taste of the tea. Chai raja cant concentrate in preparation as the Radio is going on and off due to weak signal. Chai Raja orders Sundar to climb the roof of the tea stall and hold the radio for better signal. This is the golden opportunity for Basha, with Sundar on the roof; there is no one to guard the tea. That is not it. Basha tries everything possible to make the radio signals go crazy thereby making Chai Raja go crazier and Sundar running for his dear life!

programme.title: MAKEOVER
programme.desc: On the anniversary, Chai Raja wants the interior to be swankier and hires a painter to do his forefathers portrait (looks a lot like him)- only the painter is a free-loader who paints less and swipes snacks more- and he is even shiftier than Basha. Sundar quickly notices the painters nicking habits, but cant convince Chai Raja of the same. Basha, on the other hand finds himself up against someone who is craftier than Sundar. Sundar and Basha in their own ways try to bring the thieving painter to book (while Sundar tries to amp up the portrait as well) and succeed in ousting the crook, though much cant be said of Chai Rajas portrait ... in the end it looks more like Sundars forefather than Chai Rajas.

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: TEA N TUNE
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in form splashing and whipping his frothy tea wowing his customers when suddenly the radio goes bust. Chai Raja freezes, his creative- tea affected and try as hard as he can, he can barely hold up a can- forget all the acrobatics he was normally capable of. Sundar tries his best (rigs up music with utensils, hashed-up instruments etc) to restart Chai Raja but except for the assault on ears, there is little effect on Chai Raja who stays slumped, dazed. Customers are thinning. And Basha is getting desperate since his only source of yummy food is Chai Raja. For once Sundar and Basha decide to team up together. They try to bring into the hotel all sorts of silly wacky instruments, and all kinds of musicians (from carnatics to Hindustani to pop to rastafarians) and even some crazy loud speakers to cheer up Chai Raja. But nothing! The squabble escalates till there is outright mayhem that ends in Sundar and Basha crashing into the radio. It starts playing again and Chai Raja, zaps to his skilful self and gets to chai-juggling again. Customers pop back in again and Sundar is happy, until he finds Basha gobbling food and dashes to chase him off.

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: CHOCOLATE CHAI
programme.desc: Chai Raja wants to swish up a new kind of recipe for teatime in order attract more customers. Sundar who has snuck in a tasty bar of chocolate is trying to sneak a bite as he goes about his chores in the kitchen. However thanks to his clumsiness or an altercation with Basha, Sundars chocolate bar ends up in Chai Rajas experimental kettle. Chai Raja is extremely angry at first but when he gives it a taste, he realizes that hes hit the jackpot. The customers cant get enough of the chocolate Chai and by word of mouth (shown comically like a Chinese whisper leading right upto the a famous chef) , news of his creation reaches the ears of a famous Chef. The Chef turns up at hotel Kelifornia and on tasting it wants the recipe for himself. He offers Chai Raja a lot of cash but Chai Raja refuses. But the Chef not ready to give up, decides to steal the recipe. He ropes in Basha and tries to get Sundar too to spill the beans. Its utter confusion as Sundar muddles up the Chefs ploy and Basha gets distracted by the fries far too often for the Chefs good.

programme.title: FAN-FARE
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the one and only small table fan is the point of all attraction. Chai Raja deftly improvises for himself, but he is extremely concerned that none of his customers should have cause to complain. Sundar, himself too pouring from his pores, ignores his discomfort and sets about switching the blast of breeze (though its a rickety and extremely temperamental old fan) to keep the customers cool. But Basha wants his bit of breeze and is intent to steal the wind from Sundars sails! A tug-of-war for the fan ensues... Basha plays havoc sticking vadas under the fan for wheels and wheeling it off or by hoisting it up with a tricky fishing line. Sundar tries to keep the customers happy by using palm-leaf fans and fanning with all limbs possible...but the customers are too many. And Basha aggravates matters by using the fans breeze to spray paint Sundars body with fruit juice! Sundar chases Basha who smartly propels himself about with the fan, and even blows pillow fluff at Sundar to deter him from the chase. But the last proves to be a bad idea as the fluff sticks in the fan blades, damages it and the rusty things blows up! Scene cuts to show Sundar running behind Basha..but when camera pulls back we see that the two are on a kind of crude treadmill that powers a giant coconut frond wind-mill that lulls breeze at the tea-shop. Chai Raja grins and sloshes tea that forms a smiley with a wink at camera.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must smlug drive them out before its too late.

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Colonel Nutbuster & the Candy Cane Ballerinas
programme.desc: It is indeed a silent night at the library on this Christmas Eve. The Creepy Candy are relaxing in the branches of the Christmas tree watching the snow fall outside as they wonder about the magic of Santa Clause.I am Colonel Harvey Nutbuster. My very own grandfather served with Santa during the Toy Wars. Like brothers they were! I know all about Santa!Harvey Nutbuster unlocks a book that is standing on the mantel and he clips the key to his belt and pushes the book open. The Candies strain to see inside.

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: THE DRILL GRILL
programme.desc: Construction workers leave the plot near to the hotel leaving behind their drilling machine. In the crowded hotel while Sundar is busy serving customers a loud whining sound bothers everyone. Its Basha who has found a new innovative way to be an instigator. He drills the ground with a huge drilling machine just to grill Sundar. As expected, a mad chase ensues where Basha is coming up with hilarious ideas using the drilling machine he is drilling into the earth and popping up in the tea shop stealing stuff, he is making the entire glass almirah filled with snacks vanish right underground, he jumps on the drilling machine like a jumping jack snatching food from the customers, he even makes the customer vanish underground only to throw them back minus their food. Things go haywire with a screaming Sundar chasing him. And when at last when Sundar procures the drilling machine, he trying to switch it off makes the entire hotel collapse standing proudly right in front of Chai Raja. God save Sundar!

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: FLYING TEA
programme.desc: The food inspector in in the hotel for an inspection. Juicy jalebis are being fried in the shop and a housefly comes to munch on them. Food inspector is angry and says a fly is a big NO NO. Chai Raja looks at Sundar angrily. Sundar whacks the fly with his towel and throws him out. The defeated fly sadly flies out of the shop, only to be seen by Basha who inspires him, teams up with him and decide to attack the teashop. The duo wreaks havoc in the teashop with tea flying all over the place and jalebis getting thrown all over and the customers going mad with the menacing fly. And the food inspector is visiting again and again to check the cleanliness. Chai Raja is going crazy and he knows that this is all due to Sundars fault. And now poor Sundar has two enemies Basha and the fly! Plus the strict food inspector! Oh o!!!

programme.title: Pirate Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: COMMANDO KAPPA
programme.desc: Chai Raja cycles in with a fresh batch of bananas when heavy army boots crunch in stomping at the door of the hotel. Chai Raja looks up and is not one jot happy to see his bossy estranged uncle Commando Kappa. Commando Kappa is a bossy man who wants to take over the hotel from Chai Raja and is zany enough to try any underhanded trick . Sundar senses this animosity and wants Kappa out of the shop but 6 and a half foot , Arnold like built Commando Kappa is a tough man to cross. Because he is no great cook, Kappa uses his army tactics to sabotage and tries messing up Chai Rajas ingredients- he switches the ingredients for the tea, Chai Raja knives suddenly go missing etc- Chai Raja however is quick at adapting and when knives go missing he merely uses his moustache to chop the bananas! Sunder too does his best to foil Kappa. and save Chai Raja- like when Kappa accidentally spills oil intending to slip up Chai Raja, Sundar rather himself skid in and break his own bones just so Chai Raja doesnt step into the oil or guzzle up all the chilli-spiced tea (thanks to Kappa dropping chilli powder into the brew on the sly) before Chai Raja serves it to customers and loses his reputation. However the curious Basha keeps poking his naughty nose in and its difficult for Sundar to keep up with Kappas ploys. Kappa tries to finally seize up the flexible Chai Raja, by offering a tampered herbal oil to limber him up (the oil actually stiffens whatever it is poured on- can demonstrate the effect when Kappa does a test on a small sapling on the sill). But just then Sundar and Basha tumble in as part of their chase and the oil flies landing on Kappa gets all seized up and stiff. The cricked Kappa gives up and is shown the door and Basha gives him a 21- banana peel sendoff. But Sundar has no time to rejoice for Basha is again sneaking up to the fries and must be stopped.

programme.title: Recess
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: MeetZoonicornValeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: SMART YOGURT
programme.desc: Niya unwittingly falls for Durian Grey’s latest ploy; Dojo infiltrating yoghurt chumplings.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: The Golden Fish
programme.desc: Fisherman GoGo catches the scarce golden fish, I-Go, but frees her. To repay for GoGos kindness, I-Go promises to grant his wishes, and Gogo wishes his greedy wife, WI-Gos longing to be rich.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: CHOR MACHAYE SHOR
programme.desc: Chai Raja is down with fever and needs to rest. He gives Sundar the charge of the tea stall on 2 conditions; one, he will make sure the customers get their orders on time and second he mustnt be disturbed. Basha overhears it and is enthralled. Sundar is ready for the assignment and so is Basha. Hapless Sundar has to struggle and juggle himself between his hungry customers, his sleeping master and fighting the villain of his life-BASHA.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Sing us back home
programme.desc: a panda steals Ragoo’s bamboo stick. She flees through the trees and the twins chase him, so they all end up lost

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Universal Remote
programme.desc: A mishap with electricity converts Colonel into a remote controlled dog. And Charly, Marly and Larry exploit the situation to the maximum, making poor Colonel their remote controlled puppet. But nothing is forever, now it is time the trio came into Colonel’s shoes bu ha ha ha…

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: Broken Umbrella
programme.desc: Giving umbrellas a second life with these fascinating ideas

programme.title: Super Gummy
programme.desc: Accidentally convinced that he’s a super hero, Gummy becomes Mind-O-Man – and sets out to help out everybody... to the point of driving them CRAZY!

programme.title: Burping Boulders
programme.desc: Afraid of the loud thunder in the waking world, Maple discovers in the Zooniverse that Ene fears something too - the mysterious and loud burping boulders. Together they go on a journey to face their fears - and find fun along the way. With persistence you can overcome your fears… and sharing your feelings is the start of a solution

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Fix it!
programme.desc: The twins visit a world where everything is falling apart, where they meet the frantic "fix-it team

programme.title: BUDDY SYSTEM
programme.desc: Xia rejects April’s advice on a fighting move, accepting the identical advice from Pai. Maestra Saku says today they’ll study using the Buddy System. Xia’s paired with Saku and has to knit while April and Pai learn much more exciting lessons in the forest. But the knitting lessons pay off when Xia uses his new skills to rescue April and Pai from a giant mutant spider. Xia learns females give excellent advice on fighting!

programme.title: The Golden Fish
programme.desc: Fisherman GoGo catches the scarce golden fish, I-Go, but frees her. To repay for GoGos kindness, I-Go promises to grant his wishes, and Gogo wishes his greedy wife, WI-Gos longing to be rich.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: The baby dromedary
programme.desc: The twins help a little pharaoh to find his lost pet, a baby dromedary.

programme.title: Castles in the sand
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in a world made of sand in which an evil crab-creature destroys everything.

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Acorns – Little Red Ridding Hood Case 3
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant, the elf FO, travel into the story of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD, to discover that the HUNTER has just accidentally wounded himself in the foot, before the story begins. This is a really serious problem: if the HUNTER is out of action, what will happen in the story? Who will save LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER from the evil WOLF? SANDRA and FO will make every effort, using all their ingenuity, to prevent the WOLF from devouring LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: The Vanishing Snowball
programme.desc: Jamillah wakes Aladdin by gently resting a snowball in his face. At first hes outraged that his face is wet and shes woken him up until he sees the snowball up close. Frozen water from the sky! Amazing! Hes just getting to grips with it when it starts to melt in the Baghdad heat. Genie offers to fly them to the mountains on the carpet but the carpet breaks and whilst hes fixing it the snowball starts to waste away. Aladdin tries to rush it the physician, desperate to find something to keep it cool but by the time he gets there its already gone. Aladdin is crushed but Jamillah gives him something even better - a snow globe! Now he can watch it snow every day..

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Robo-Gummy
programme.desc: Finding himself over-committed to too many things, Gummy orders a few duplicate robots of himself... who winds up in the end causing more trouble than they’re worth!

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: The Mystery
programme.desc: Kala’s martial arts trophy has vanished – and ‘detective’ Gummy volunteers his services to unravel the mystery and track down the culprit.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: XIA’S BAD DREAM
programme.desc: Xia becomes over-confident after he pulls off an impossible move invented by the Elders. But in his dreams, he keeps losing to mutants! April and Xia have to go into his nightmare and give him advice to conquer his dream enemies.

programme.title: The Fly-Away Nightingale
programme.desc: Whilst picking some fruit, Aladdin accidentally lets the Sultans precious nightingale go free. Genie is convinced that he can call him back using a spell but he cant remember where it is, so Jamillah and Aladdin run after it. They chase the bird to the market where he lands on a traders stall and Jamillah must outwit the trader using her modern phone to get him back. Finally Jamillah and Aladdin call Genie to use the magic carpet to retrieve it and Genie remembers the right spell just in time.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: Unlucky Fred
programme.desc: Fred relies on his lucky dice for every decision. At a theme park, he loses them, and has trouble coping without them. Along the way he also loses Friday! Fred has to rely on more than luck to get them both back.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Stitch in Time
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words "THE END."

programme.title: Tulips Shall Grow 1942
programme.desc: A carefree boy and a young girl find their idyllic countryside invaded by an army of mindlessly destructive robots.

programme.title: The Draft Horse 1942
programme.desc: A farm horse tries to enlist in the army, but despite his virtuoso display of wartime histrionics, he's rejected when he flunks the physical. Dejected, he wanders into a mock battlefield, which tells him what war is really like.

programme.title: Sinbad the Sailor 1935
programme.desc: Sinbad battles a band of pirates at sea and on a tropical isle. A giant bird rescues him, and he ends up back on his ship with the pirates' treasure

programme.title: Broom Stick Bunny 1956
programme.desc: Witch Hazel's claim to be the ugliest witch of all is threatened by a Halloween witch who turns out to be Bugs trick-or-treating.

programme.title: Leprechauns Gold 1949
programme.desc: A song-filled Noveltoon featuring the antics of the Irish Leprechauns during their annual gold-washing ceremony. It depicts the wee people of Ireland who flavor its traditions with laughs and legend.

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Nearly Weds 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto both plan to marry Olive Oyl, but Popeye proposes first. When Olive says, "Yes!" to Popeye, Bluto sets out to make Popeye look bad, break up the wedding, and win Olive over.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: Felix in the Bone Age-1922
programme.desc: Felix comes upon a caveman and his girlfriend. The girlfriend is crying, and when the caveman asks her what she wants, she points to Felix. The caveman chases Felix, who escapes by using the tails of some friendly monkeys to make his way down a steep cliff. Later he makes friends with a baby monkey, but winds up getting in a fight with a huge gorilla.

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye 1957
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: Tramp, Tramp, Tramp the Boys Are Marching-1924
Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Customers Wanted 1939
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto compete in their penny arcades for Wimpy's business

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Felix the Cat - Felix in Holly wood -1923
Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: Jungle Drums- 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: Norman Normal 1968
programme.desc: After a multicolored rock group introduces the cartoon, Norman Normal is asked by a boss to wine and dine a client at a nightclub party, something Normal is uncomfortable with. He talks with his dad about it who rambles on and tells Norman, "don't make waves". At the party, Norman talks with his lampshade-clad friend Leo, disapproves of a joke told by one of the guests suspecting it's about a "minority group" and is ridiculed by the bartender for only having a ginger ale. Norman leaves the party and returns us to the multicolored rock group.

programme.title: Taxi Turvy 1945
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: The Lucy Show 1966: Season 5; Episode 8; Lucy and Carol in Palm Springs
programme.desc: Lucy calls in sick so she can join her roommate at a Palm Springs resort. Unfortunately, her boss, Mr. Mooney, is staying at the same hotel.

programme.title: Li'l Abner 1940
programme.desc: The goings-on in the rural Southern community of Dogpatch, USA.

Loser's End-1934
programme.desc: Jack rides into trouble when he meets up with Bill Meeker and his outlaw gang. Rescued from the gang's clutches by Don carlos, he joins forces with Carlos and with the help of Lolita who learns of the gang's next raid, they go after the culprits.

programme.title: Lightning Bill 1938
programme.desc: Lightning Carson's nephew has been falsely accused of murder. To get in with the gang, Lightning poses as a Mexican. He also appears as himself making his costume changes at his sister's ranch. Just as he about to bring in the gang, a henchman finds evidence of his masquerade and arrives to expose the hoax.

programme.title: Old west tv stories of the century
Law of the Timber -1941
programme.desc: The H&L Lumber Company headed by Henry Lorimer and his daughter "Perry", receives a huge national defense order, and prepares to cut the dangerous Antler Valley tract. Eastern dude John Gordon applies for a lumberjack's job and Lorimer hires him. Soon, a series of accidents occur, topped by a forest fire of unknown origin, in which Lorimer is killed. Perry decides to carry on in her father's place, despite the objections of camp manager Barnes, who covets the company. The storehouse, where the dynamite needed to clear an avalanche is stored, explodes and Barnes blames Gordon. The latter has some cartridge cases used by the rifleman to explode the storehouse, and Barnes instructs his henchman Hodge Mason to get the evidence and kill Gordon. Perry overhears and attempts to stop them, but Barnes knocks her unconscious and puts her in the cab of a runaway train. Unable to keep Mason from reaching the plunger to set off an explosion to wreck the train, Gordon boards the speeding engine and races it over the danger spot ahead of the explosion. The engine and a few cars of lumber get through, and Perry is able to deliver the lumber order on schedule. Mason and Barnes are apprehended and Perry learns that Gordon is really John Gordon Hamilton, son of her late father's
